hero.title: Sora 2 ‚Äì AI Video from Text or Image with Native Sound
hero.intro: Sora 2 by OpenAI brings text-to-video and image-to-video generation into one engine, combining cinematic visuals with full native audio‚Äîvoice-over, ambient sound, and synced motion. Animate concepts, scenes, or objects directly from words or reference images without leaving MaxVideoAI.

overview: Generate videos from text or images using Sora 2 ‚Äî now with voice-over, ambient sound, and smooth animation. Animate reference stills or craft full prompts with synced audio.

promptStructure.title: Prompt Structure
promptStructure.quote: ‚ÄúA glowing library in the middle of a stormy ocean, books flying in the air, camera pans upward to reveal lightning in the sky, soft orchestral music, voice-over: 'Knowledge survives everything.'‚Äù
promptStructure.description: Structure each Sora 2 run for clarity and fidelity:
steps: Start with a vivid scene description (setting + atmosphere)
Add motion instructions: camera movement, timing, and pacing cues
Specify audio beats (voice-over tone, ambient FX, or music)
Mention continuity needs if you are remixing an image or scene

faqs.q: Can I access Sora 2 from Europe?
faqs.a: Yes. MaxVideoAI brokers access so European teams can render without waiting on an OpenAI invite.

faqs.q: Do Sora 2 renders include a watermark?
faqs.a: No. Outputs are delivered clean, ready for editing and distribution.

faqs.q: How does billing work with FAL credits or my OpenAI API key?
faqs.a: MaxVideo AI routes Sora 2 runs through FAL by default. Drop your own OpenAI API key in the app to bill usage directly through OpenAI‚Äîthe interface keeps showing an indicative rate and adds a "Billed by OpenAI" badge so finance teams stay aligned.

pricingNotes: Live pricing updates inside the Generate workspace. Check the current rate before you run a job.
